thread.title: cheryl singer
thread.title_full: Scientifics Online reviewed by cheryl singer

author: cheryl singer
title: cheryl singer
text:
Ordered 4 items for grandaughters' birthday...all age appropriate. items were as advertised.
Only minor problem was the way 2 items arrived. Lip Balm kit was not securely closed so looked like it had already been opened, and the magic tricks box was slightly crushed in one corner.
